CustomField.description: Label displayed at the start (left side) of a horizontal scale question. For example: "Very Difficult", "Strongly Disagree", or "Very Dissatisfied". This helps users understand what the lowest value on the scale represents.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the label for the start of the scale (e.g., "Very Difficult"). This will be displayed on the left side of horizontal scale questions to guide respondents.
CustomField.label: Scale Start Label
